abstract.t: This document describes EDS (Equivalent Differentiated Services), anew building-block for a simple, robust, free and scalable end-to-endservice differentiation in IP networks. The EDS schema aims toprovide a spectrum of 'different but equal' network services thatoffer to the end-to-end flows a trade-off between delay and lossrate. The EDS schema can be deployed incrementally in the Internet.
